pr_title: Add field SLEEP_SINCE to session and INFORMATION_SCHEMA.SESSIONS table

timeline.message:
Add field SLEEP_SINCE to session and INFORMATION_SCHEMA.SESSIONS table

; Conflicts:
;	h2/src/main/org/h2/engine/Session.java
;	h2/src/main/org/h2/table/MetaTable.java

timeline.bodyText: Maybe I'm wrong, but it looks like there is no need for two fields, a single shared filed may be used to store timestamp of last change. Session knows its state (see Session.state), so current meaning of the field can be easily determined.
timeline.author: katzyn

replies.bodyText: Agreed, maybe we rename the field to currentCommandStartOrEnd to indicate this dual use of the value?
replies.author: cbvms123

replies.bodyText: Code now shares the field commandStartOrEnd for storing the timestamp
replies.author: cbvms123

timeline.message: Share field for start and end time of command
Rename field and getter to reflect dual use of value
